allowance(address,address).details: Returns number of allowed tokens for given address.

approve(address,uint256).details: Sets approved amount of tokens for spender. Returns success.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns number of tokens owned by given address.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Transfers sender's tokens to a given address. Returns success.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Allows allowed third party to transfer tokens from one address to another. Returns success.

params._from: Address from where tokens are withdrawn.
params._to: Address to where tokens are sent.

allowance(address,address).details: Returns number of allowed tokens for given address.

approve(address,uint256).details: Sets approved amount of tokens for spender. Returns success.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns number of tokens owned by given address.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Transfers sender's tokens to a given address. Returns success.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Allows allowed third party to transfer tokens from one address to another. Returns success.

params._from: Address from where tokens are withdrawn.
params._to: Address to where tokens are sent.

balanceMessageHash(address,uint32,uint32.details: Returns a hash of the balance message needed to be signed by the sender.

params._balance: The amount of tokens owed by the sender to the receiver.
params._open_block_number: The block number at which a channel between the sender and receiver was created.
params._receiver: The address that receives token payments.

close(address,uint32,uint32,bytes).details: Function called when any of the parties wants to close the channel and settle; receiver needs a balance proof to immediately settle, sender triggers a challenge period.

params._balance: The amount of tokens owed by the sender to the receiver.
params._balance_msg_sig: The balance message signed by the sender.
params._open_block_number: The block number at which a channel between the sender and receiver was created.
params._receiver: The address that receives token payments.

close(address,uint32,uint32,bytes,bytes).details: Function called by the sender, when he has a closing signature from the receiver; channel is closed immediately.

params._balance: The amount of tokens owed by the sender to the receiver.
params._balance_msg_sig: The balance message signed by the sender.
params._closing_sig: The hash of the signed balance message, signed by the receiver.
params._open_block_number: The block number at which a channel between the sender and receiver was created.
params._receiver: The address that receives token payments.

closingAgreementMessageHash(bytes).details: Returns a hash of the balance message that was signed by the sender, so it can be subsequently signed by the receiver.

params._balance_msg_sig: The balance message signed by the sender.

closingAgreementMessageHash(bytes).return: Hash of the balance message signed by the sender.

createChannel(address,uint32).details: Creates a new channel between a sender and a receiver and transfers the sender's token deposit to this contract.

params._deposit: The amount of tokens that the sender escrows.
params._receiver: The address that receives token payments.

getChannelInfo(address,address,uint32).details: Function for getting information about a channel.

params._open_block_number: The block number at which a channel between the sender and receiver was created.
params._receiver: The address that receives token payments.
params._sender: The address that sends token payments.

getKey(address,address,uint32).details: Returns the unique channel identifier used in the contract.

params._open_block_number: The block number at which a channel between the sender and receiver was created.
params._receiver: The address that receives token payments.
params._sender: The address that sends token payments.

settle(address,uint32).details: Function called by the sender after the challenge period has ended, in case the receiver has not closed the channel.

params._open_block_number: The block number at which a channel between the sender and receiver was created.
params._receiver: The address that receives token payments.

params._added_deposit: The added token deposit with which the current deposit is increased.
params._open_block_number: The block number at which a channel between the sender and receiver was created.
params._receiver: The address that receives token payments.

verifyBalanceProof(address,uint32,uint32.details: Returns the sender address extracted from the balance proof.

params._balance: The amount of tokens owed by the sender to the receiver.
params._balance_msg_sig: The balance message signed by the sender.
params._open_block_number: The block number at which a channel between the sender and receiver was created.
params._receiver: The address that receives token payments.

verifyBalanceProof(address,uint32,uint32.return: Address of the token payments sender.

verifyClosingSignature(bytes,bytes).details: Returns the receiver address extracted from the closing signature and the signed balance message.

params._balance_msg_sig: The balance message signed by the sender.
params._closing_sig: The hash of the signed balance message, signed by the receiver.

verifyClosingSignature(bytes,bytes).return: Address of the token payments receiver.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns number of tokens owned by given address.

devdoc.title: Standard token contract - Standard token implementation.

params._owner: The address of the account owning tokens
params._spender: The address of the account able to transfer the tokens

allowance(address,address).return: Amount of remaining tokens allowed to spent

params._spender: The address of the account able to transfer the tokens
params._value: The amount of tokens to be approved for transfer

approve(address,uint256).return: Whether the approval was successful or not

params._owner: The address from which the balance will be retrieved

params._value: The amount of token to be transferred

transfer(address,uint256).return: Whether the transfer was successful or not

params._value: The amount of token to be transferred

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).return: Whether the transfer was successful or not

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: send `_value` token to `_to` from `_from` on the condition it is approved by `_from`
